price: Ese (bibwira ko) baremwe nta cyo bakomowemo, cyangwa ni bo baremyi?
arabic: أَمۡ خُلِقُواْ مِنۡ غَيۡرِ شَيۡءٍ أَمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰلِقُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: am khuliqū min ghayri shayin am humu al-khāliqūna
